findings.title: Out of Gas rebalanceAndFill
findings.description: The loop in `_rebalanceAndFill` depends on the passed ticks and could theoretically get so big that it won't fit in an Ethereum block anymore.

findings.title: No Escape Mechanisms
findings.description: The `DCA` bridge lacks 'escape' mechanisms if `ORACLE` stops reporting prices, potentially locking funds forever due to insufficient Uniswap liquidity.

findings.title: Information Notes
findings.description: The finding includes several informational notes to improve code complexity and add sanity checks.
